text:
How pathetic @scotgov can’t bring themselves to acknowledge it’s the OXFORD / AstraZeneca vaccine... nor that it’s sourced by @UKGovScotland, nor if we were still in EU it would still be awaiting approval, let alone be in people’s arms.
#CovidVaccine #COVID19 #COVIDIOTS #Vaccine https://t.co/OwobLfncjv
